ResearchTabDef.label: Biological Warfare
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Develop lethal pathogens, craft long-range devastating weapons, and study antigens for vaccines production.\n\nThere's no need to rush all research projects in this tab. You can wait until you discover new diseases before researching weapons available in your colony's biome.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pathogen production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Acquire disease samples from sick colonists to initiate a production chain of powerful pathogens.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the technology to sample diseases and craft deadly pathogens.

You can make pawns immune to pathogen gas by boosting their toxic environment resistance to 80%. That means equipping them with gas masks, respiratory masks, or special bionics.

Note that some species are naturally immune, insects being one of them.

This type of gas is most effective on average-sized target groups, but becomes less efficient on larger ones. A large number of targets quickly dilutes the gas, making it weaker.
